listitem.para: Base class (interface) for all hardware drivers in the operating system.
Manages a collection of Driver objects, facilitating their activation and organization.
Driver for the PS/2 keyboard, handling scancodes and managing keyboard state (Shift, Caps Lock). @inherits hardware_communication::InterruptHandler @inherits driver::Driver.
Base class (interface) for handling keyboard events (key presses and releases).
Driver for the PS/2 mouse, handling 3-byte packets and managing mouse state. @inherits hardware_communication::InterruptHandler @inherits driver::Driver.
Base class (interface) for handling mouse events (movement and button clicks).
